name: The Fergison Mansion
description:
Little Timmy got dared to enter the Fergison mansion, expecting to find treasure. But he found more than expected when he was unable to leave....

---

A short metroidvania/ collection platformer set in a spooky house for Bored Pixels Jam 9. The theme is the environment changes you, and as you explore more of the spooky areas of the house you magically gain new powers to navigate them.

We decided to work within the general graphical specs of the gameboy as a challenge, with 8x8 pixel art and tiles, and a 4 colour setup. We didn't stick entirely within these limits, but it was fun to do!

Controls:

WASD or Arrows to move

Space to Jump

Space again to Double Jump (after unlocking ability)

E to use second unlockable ability. 

R to use final unlockable ability.
